first_para: Richard Quentin Fuller (born 30 May 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bedford, where he was born.

full.extract:
Richard Quentin Fuller (born 30 May 1962) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bedford, where he was born.
Fuller had previously achieved prominence as a leader of the Young Conservatives and Tory "wet"
full.title: Richard Fuller (Bedford MP)
